Html:
set /p start= "Start #?"
set /p end= "End #?"
for /l %%X in (%start%, 1, %end%) do samplemarkercreatord.exe %%X

Just make a text file cut and past the following code in, and save it as a .bat or .cmd put it in your alvar1.2.0/bin/msvc90 dir 

it will allow you to create Alvar png files for any sequence you want.

 

set /p start= "Start #?"

set /p end= "End #?"

for /l %%X in (%start%, 1, %end%) do samplemarkercreatord.exe %%X

This is great! But... what do you do next?

 

Sorry for picking up an old thread, but I'm new here.
